[THIS-865] ðŸ“ŠAllow updating index and constraints (#1445)

# Description

To achieve modifying indexes and constraints I do 2 steps.

1. I update the plan step in the SchemaDeployer to change modified
index/constrains as a removal + addition,
[ref](https://github.com/cognitedata/neat/pull/1445/files#diff-7405e66a129630712b1d0dbaa902b40d7dd3b3619da87bb3a3eb3f8f7066637bR235).
2. I update the consolidate plan to not consolidate removals if they are
additions for index/constraints,
[ref](https://github.com/cognitedata/neat/pull/1445/files#diff-6bef3b9717d4220abd54d9be42a0d18df521591fc8eb0ea87a5e9449ae0917f1R336).

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Improved

- [alpha v1] Neat now allows you to modify a constraint or index on a
container. Neat does this by removing and readding it.
